meanings.definition: The branch of anthropology that deals with the measurement of the human body.
meanings.sent1: Anthropometry helps scientists understand how people's bodies are measured.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use anthropometry to determine the dimensions of a person's body.
meanings.sent3: During the anthropometry class, the students had fun measuring each other's body parts.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, anthropometry plays a crucial role in designing clothes that fit well.
meanings.sent5: The precision of anthropometry ensures accurate data for medical research.

meanings.definition: The measurement of the size and proportions of the human body.
meanings.sent1: Anthropometry involves taking precise measurements of different body parts.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use anthropometry to compare the body sizes of various populations.
meanings.sent3: The anthropometry results showed that the basketball team had similar body proportions.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in anthropometry allowed her to create custom clothing for clients.
meanings.sent5: The art of anthropometry reveals the diversity in human body shapes.
